Name: File Copy (Option 1)
Description: Copies a file from one location to another

Name: File Delete (Option 2)
Description: Deletes a file from a given location

Name: Query Folder Files (Option 3)
Description: Print to console list of all files in folders

Name: Create Folder (Option 4)
Description: Creates a new folder at specified folder path

Name: Download File (Option 5)
Description: Downloads a file from a given URL

Name: Wait (Option 6)
Description: Pauses the execution for a specified amount of time

Name: Conditional Count Rows File (Option 7)
Description: Count of rows in the file that contain the search string
Parameter: Source File, String to search in rows

Name: Move File (Option 8)
Description: Moves a file from a source to a destination path.

Name: Write Text to File (Option 9)
Description: Writes provided text content to a specified file.

Name: Read Text from File (Option 10)
Description: Reads and displays the content of a text file.
